lead_paragraph: BRICKMAN--Leon. The New York State Advisory Committee on Civil Practice mourns the loss of our beloved member, Leon Brickman. For over 30 years, Leon graced our Committee with his vast legal knowledge, his stories of courthouse lore, and his humor. We will miss him. 1/3
